note:
Dread Cyser Empress and Cider Barrel Wrangler, aka @alwen_lost_arts on that bird site

I read and play with string. I watch over >1 vintage sewing machines.

Spinner, knitter, bobbin lacemaker, weaver. Sometime tatter, netmaker, chair caner.
Bread maker, weather geek, chicken photographer.

No longer exactly sure how many vintage sewing machines are hanging around here.

fields.name: Follow requests
fields.value: Mostly approved if I can figure out why you'd want to!
